section.title: Glance Container Name Change Requires Update of Driver Information
section.para: If you have Ironic nodes in your existing &product; 3.0 cloud, with perhaps some nodes running provisioned instances and some in the available state, you will need to update the driver information after upgrade to &product; to point at new deploy images.

After upgrade, a registered ironic node could be in Available, Active (with running instances) or clean_failed provisioning states. Use the information in the following sections to update the driver information appropriately.

section.title: Node has provisioning state Available or Active
section.para: Update node driver-info to use latest version of the deployed image, for example:

listitem.para: Extract glance_ramdisk_uuid using glance image-list | grep ir-deploy-ramdisk-HOS4.0
Extract glance_kernel_uuid using glance image-list | grep ir-deploy-kernel-HOS4.0

section.title: Node Enters clean_failed State after Upgrade
section.para: If you have provisioned a node in &productname; 3.0.2 and you try to delete the node after upgrade to &productnumber; 4.0, then node enters the clean_failed state. Execute the following steps to fix the problem:

listitem.para: Update node driver-info to use latest version of the deployed image, for example:
Extract glance_ramdisk_uuid using glance image-list | grep ir-deploy-ramdisk-HOS4.0
Extract glance_kernel_uuid using glance image-list | grep ir-deploy-kernel-HOS4.0

section.title: Re-upload User Images for Agent-Based Drivers
section.para: After upgrade from &productname; &productnumber; 3.0.2, if you have a node enrolled with agent based drivers and and try to spawn an instance with user images uploaded in &productnumber; 3.0.2, instance creation will fail with the message "Error downloading image".

You will need to re-upload any user images that were uploaded in &productnumber; 3.0.2, so that the images are uploaded to a new glance container. This will allow instance creation from nodes with agent-based drivers to succeed.
In the followng example, the rhel_bios image is downloaded from Glance, and then re-uploaded to Glance.

listitem.para: Download the rhel_bios image from Glance
